title: Beaker
dimensions:
H x diam. (bottle): 14 x 7.3 cm (5 1/2 x 2 7/8 in.)
H x diam. (cup): 8.7 x 5.3 cm (3 7/16 x 2 1/16 in.)

glass. Gift of Harry Dennis Jr.. 1969-127-27-a/f.
